patterns.memento

Memento pattern utilities.

Implements a small memento system to capture and restore game state. Useful for save/load, checkpoints, and rollback scenarios. Includes GameMemento, GameCaretaker, and GameOriginator classes.

class patterns.memento.GameCaretaker(max_snapshots=10)

Bases: object

Caretaker that manages multiple game mementos.

Provides named snapshot storage and a simple automatic snapshot list used for checkpointing.

delete_snapshot(name)

Elimina un snapshot

Parameters:

name (str)

Return type:

bool

Return type:

class patterns.memento.GameMemento(state, metadata=None)

Bases: object

A memento that stores a snapshot of the game state.

Stores a deep copy of the provided state dictionary along with optional metadata (name, timestamp, etc.).

Parameters:

  • state (Dict[str, Any])

  • metadata (Dict[str, Any] | None)

get_description()

Retorna descripción legible del memento

Return type:

str

get_metadata()

Retorna metadata del memento

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

get_state()

Retorna una copia del estado guardado

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

get_timestamp()

Retorna el timestamp de creación

Return type:

datetime

class patterns.memento.GameOriginator(gameManager)

Bases: object

Originator that creates and restores game mementos.

Knows how to capture the current game manager state and to apply a memento to restore that state back onto the game manager.

create_memento(name='snapshot')

Crea un memento del estado actual del juego

Parameters:

name (str)

Return type:

GameMemento

restore_memento(memento)

Restaura el estado del juego desde un memento

Parameters:

memento (GameMemento)

Return type:

bool
